data.title: Masakatsu Agatsu Katsu Hayabi [Archive]
data.meta_description:
True victory is victory over self 
 
Victory right here, right now. 
 
-M. Ueshiba 
 
In light of certain discussions centered on winning and losing, and this being the aikido forum, I thought I'd bring this up.   
 
I think some good points have been make on being martial, on all sides of the discussion.  I also believe that many of the training methods today (my own included) are pretty light when it comes to the methods used at the Kobukan dojo, the Kodokan during the same time period, and
